Name: MISP
Description: MISP is an open-source threat intelligence platform for sharing, storing, and correlating Indicators of Compromise (IOCs) about malware threats.
HTU: Install MISP, configure it for data sharing, and use the web interface to share and analyze threat data.

Name: ThreatConnect
Description: ThreatConnect is a comprehensive threat intelligence platform that integrates threat data, automates processes, and enhances security operations.
HTU: Sign up for ThreatConnect, configure data sources, and use the platform to manage and analyze threat intelligence.

Name: Open Threat Exchange (OTX)
Description: OTX is an open-source threat intelligence community that enables collaborative defense with real-time data sharing.
HTU: Sign up for OTX, join the community, and access threat data feeds for analysis.

Name: PassiveTotal
Description: PassiveTotal is a threat intelligence platform that provides insights into threat infrastructure using passive DNS data and other sources.
HTU: Sign up for PassiveTotal, configure data sources, and use the platform to analyze threat data.

Name: OpenCTI
Description: OpenCTI is an open-source threat intelligence platform that provides a structured and collaborative environment for threat data analysis.
HTU: Install OpenCTI, configure data sources, and use the web interface for threat analysis and sharing.
